education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
education.institute: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University, Greater Noida
education.description: Pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering from Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University. Skilled in Java full-stack development, DSA, and web technologies. Built projects using Spring Boot, React.js, and MySQL. Participated in hackathons and technical workshops, enhancing problem-solving skills.

Completed Intermediate in Science (PCM) from D.S College, Katihar. Studied Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics, building a strong foundation in analytical and problem-solving skills. Participated in science-related activities and projects, enhancing practical knowledge.

experience.description: Worked on Java projects from level 1 to level 3, learning concepts such as string manipulation, file handling, network programming, client-server message exchange, multithreading, concurrent programming, event handling, and API integration.

Worked on a Diabetes Prediction System using machine learning. Preprocessed medical data, performed EDA using Python libraries (Pandas, Seaborn), and built models using Logistic Regression, Random Forest, and SVM. Evaluated accuracy with precision, recall, F1-score, and ROC-AUC.
